overview:
We take Twitter out of the box!

For events:

Twisplays - Twitter displays - are inexpensive one-line LED signs that are perfect for trade shows, conferences, events and parties. Twisplays attract attention. Use Twisplays to promote your business, brand and Twitter stream. Use Twisplays to inform, entertain and liven up an event or party. Display what people are saying and create interactive forums. If you are an event organizer or venue manager, use Twisplays to generate extra income from sponsors and advertisers.
